platformIndependence.pltIndependenceDesc:
The users for this project have to collect multispectral data using the one following private mandatory hardware dependencies: 
 - https: //www.dji.com/p4-multispectral 
 - https: //micasense.com/es/rededge-mx/ 
 - https: //micasense.com/es/altum/ 
 - https: //sentera.com/6x-multispectral/ 
 Optional Softwares for Photogrammetry: 
 - https: //www.dji.com/dji-terra 
 - https: //www.pix4d.com/ 
 - https: //www.dronedeploy.com/ 
 All the software and AI Models are developed using Open Source Programming libraries (Python, JavaScript, TensorFlow). And each component is independent of the hardware used to collect data and the software to make the photogrammetry 
 Open Alternative Software for Photogrammetry: 
 - https: //www.opendronemap.org/ 
 There are not open-source alternatives for Multispectral UAV data collection.

privacyComplianceList: LAW 19628: ON PROTECTION OF PRIVATE LIFE (CHILE)
adherenceSteps: Application: 1.466.138.- PRODUCCIONES RG SPA, CHILE.- Denominative: AI Agro.- Brand of products and services: Updating and rental of software for data processing; rental of software; rental of application software; computer software rental; development of programs for data processing for others; research, inspection and testing in agriculture, livestock breeding and fishing, in class 42.
